BuffTable_Clean.json.ChineseShort: 圆舞斩触发恢复气刃值

SkillTable_Clean.json.EnglishLong:
Ice Energy
A key resource for unleashing Special Attacks and Expertise. Starts with a maximum of 50 points, automatically restoring 2 points per second.

Basic Attack: Raincall Surge
Unleashes up to four consecutive water-based attacks, each dealing Magic Damage.

Tips: When Ice Energy is low, this skill allows you to deal DMG flexibly as needed.

Unleashes a water vortex at the target's feet, continuously dealing Magic Damage to enemies within range. Each time DMG is dealt, for every target hit, restores 2 Ice Energy. A maximum of 10 Ice Energy can be restored per hit.

Ultra Cold Vortex
While in the Ultra Cold state, the water vortex will freeze and violently explode upon ending, dealing higher Magic Damage to all enemies within range.

Tips: Pair with Frostbeam Spec. Casting at the right moment can restore considerable Ice Energy.

Casts a slow-moving water orb and gains 1 Frost Crystal immediately, and 1 Frost Crystal every 3s thereafter. On impact, the orb's velocity decays. While the aqueous orb persists, it continuously deals Magic Damage to all nearby enemies and applies Frost to them.

Ultra Cold Crystal Veil
While in the Ultra Cold, the water orb will freeze and violently explode upon ending, dealing higher Magic Damage to all enemies within range.

This skill holds 2 charges.

Tips: At least one charge shall be maintained at all times, unless Ice Energy exceeds its maximum capacity. It is recommended to maintain two charges before casting the Ultimate, as combining it with Ultra Cold grants bonus DMG.

SkillTable_Clean.json.ChineseShort: 博伊斯协同子弹触发被动

SkillTable_Clean.json.EnglishLong:
Consumes 5 Ice Energy to instantly summon 3 Meteor Storms above the target, dealing Magic Damage to the target and surrounding enemies.
This skill holds 2 charges.

Tips: This instant-cast DMG skill is best utilized in a highly mobile style of combat to maximize DMG dealt through repeated use.

Unleashes built-up cold energy in a violent surge, dealing Magic Damage and inflicting Frozen on nearby enemies.
Charging the skill alters both its range and DMG.
Tier 1: Chants for 1s, targeting an 8m frontal cone.
Tier 2: Chants for 2s, targeting an 8m frontal cone with 50% increased DMG.
Tier 3: Chants for 3s, targeting an 8m frontal cone with 100% increased DMG.
When holding 1 / 3 / 5 Frozen, the skill will instantly cast at Tier 1 / 2 / 3, skipping the charge time.

Tips: This skill offers both area damage and crowd control. For best results, cast it when you have high Frost Crystal count.

Consumes 15 Ice Energy to launch a concentrated ice beam toward the target, dealing Magic Damage to all enemies in its path every 0.3s. After dealing DMG 5 instances, the beam attempts to consume additional Ice Energy to sustain itself. Every 12 Ice Energy extends the beam by 0.3s and deals 1 additional instance of DMG. Each time Frostbeam deals DMG, it increases its own DMG by 8%, up to 80%. (Beam terminates when Ice Energy drops below 3.)
Frostbeam's firing interval is affected by Haste.

Tips: Cast when Ice Energy is near maximum capacity for extended beam duration. While firing, use the joystick to make minor positioning adjustments.

Chants for 1.4s, then consumes 10 Ice Energy to fire a sharp Frost Lance at the target, dealing Magic Damage on impact.
Allows the consumption of 1 Frost Crystal to skip chanting and to increase DMG by 20%.

Tips: Cast Frost Lance regularly to avoid wasting excess Energy.

Summons the Strength of Ice to generate 6 Ice Energy per second and increase Haste for the duration.

Tips: Increases attack and casting speed. Since this skill generates Ice Energy, avoid using it when Ice Energy is near maximum, but you may quickly spend Ice Energy after casting this skill.

Chants for 2.9s, then consumes 20 Ice Energy to summon an intense Blizzard at the target location, continuously dealing Magic Damage and applying Frost to all enemies within the area.

Tips: This devastating AoE skill is most effective when used against immobilized enemies to maximize DMG dealt.

Encase the caster in ice, and make caster immune to all DMG but are unable to move for the duration. Deals Magic Damage to all nearby enemies, and inflicts Slow, which upgrades to Frozen.

Tips: This skill is intended to be equipped in high-pressure situations to increase survivability.

Summons a surging Tidal Vortex at the target location, dealing Magic Damage on impact. Channels for 5s after casting. Recast to end early.

Ultra Cold: Tidepool
In the Ultra Cold state, the vortex freezes and violently explodes upon ending, dealing higher Magic Damage to all enemies within range.

Tips: You cannot move or cast other skills while channeling. Best paired with allies' AoE skills in coordinated attacks.

Summon the ice's blessing to unfold an Ice Domain, knocking all enemies back within the range. Then summons a comet to strike the targets, dealing Magic Damage and inflicting Frozen on all affected enemies.
Ice Domain
Within the Domain, restores 220 Ice Energy over time and gains Ultra Cold. Enemies within the domain are continuously Slowed, escalating to Frozen.
While in Ultra Cold, targets are treated as Frozen.

Tips: Casting should be avoided when Ice Energy approaches its maximum capacity, otherwise the Ice Energy will be quickly depleted. The skill is best casted within the range of Ultra Cold

SkillTable_Clean.json.EnglishLong:
Courage
A vital resource needed to perform Special Attacks and select Expertise Skills. Automatically recovers at 3 points per second, with a starting maximum of 100 points.

Basic Attack: Windborne Grace
Executes a sequence of up to four attacks, dealing Attack Damage

Tips: Fill the gaps with Basic Attacks when Courage is too low for other offensive skills.

Launches into enemy lines, dealing Attack Damage to enemies in range and knocking them Airborne. Restores 100 Courage.

"Endless storm, unlock thy mighty power at my knight's command! Wind, reveal thy glory with a surging rush!"

Tips: Cast when Courage is low.

Raises the banner spear, applying Inspire to allies before a follow-up leap can be launched, dealing Attack Damage to the enemies within range and knocking them airborne, while restoring 100 Courage.
Inspire: Lasts for 10s. During this time, all allies' Haste +10%. You restore 10 Courage per second and 1 stack of Sharp every 2s.
"Endless storm, unlock thy mighty power at my knight's command! Wind, reveal thy glory with a surging rush! Manifest in the wind!

Tips: Cast when Courage is low.

Deals Attack Damage equal to 100% ATK to all the enemies, which scales with the Level/Tier of Basic Attack.
Restores 10 Courage immediately upon use.

Consumes 50 Courage to perform 3 thrusts toward the enemy, dealing Attack Damage with each hit.

Tips: Time casts carefully, and use this skill between Basic Attacks, as Courage takes time to accumulate.

Consumes 35 Courage to leap into the air and deliver a downward strike on the enemy, dealing Attack Damage.
"Even if enemy lines are unbreakable, the wind of victory will tear them asunder!"

Tips: Cast when Courage is near cap. When casting in succession, the leap is skipped for faster follow-up attacks.

Stuns enemies in front upon casting, dealing Attack Damage. While active, continuously restores 105 Courage and increases your Strength.
This skill holds 2 charges.

Tips: Cast when Courage is low.

Consumes 30 Courage to reel in the spinning lance and unleash a final piercing strike. The spiraling gust tears through the air, dealing sustained Attack Damage to enemies within range. The initial strike inflicts a 50% Wound on the target, lasting 10s.

Tips: Whenever you have enough Courage, use it on your most important skill.

Lunges toward the enemy, dealing Attack Damage and gaining 15 Courage. Can be cast again to unleash a sweeping slash, dealing Attack Damage to all nearby enemies and knocking them Airborne. Targets with Resilience cannot be knocked airborne but will have their Resilience reduced. Additionally, gains 10 Courage for each enemy hit, up to a maximum of 50 Courage.

Tips: Equip when facing multiple enemies.

Condenses wind pressure in front of the caster, rendering the caster immune to all DMG. Counterattack DMG is incrementally amplified with each incoming attack, dealing Attack Damage in retaliation.

Tips: This skill is intended to be used in high-pressure situations to increase chances of survival. The more frequent enemy attack, the more this skill brings you.

Consumes 2 stacks of Sharp to leap into the air and deliver a powerful aerial strike, dealing Attack Damage.

Tips: Combo with Skyward Spec. Cast when Courage is low to prevent overcapping and wasting Courage regeneration.

Consumes 40 Courage to leap into the air and hurl a wind-forged spear with force. Deals Attack Damage to all enemies in range and greatly reduces their Resilience. Grants 1 stack of Sharp.

Tips: Effective against enemies with Resilience. Also recommended when dealing with multiple targets.

Launches into enemy lines, dealing Attack Damage to enemies in range and knocking them Airborne. Restores 100 Courage.
"Endless storm, unlock thy mighty power at my knight's command! Wind, reveal thy glory with a surging rush!"

Tips: Cast when Courage is low.

Leaps backward and throws a lance at the target area, dealing Wind DMG. If Battle Will exceeds 3 points, it is enhanced to Typhoon: Falcon Toss.
Typhoon: Falcon Toss
Consumes all Battle Will, then leaps and hurls a powerful lance at the target area, dealing Wind DMG. Grants a Shield based on the amount of Battle Will consumed.
"Even if enemy lines are unbreakable, the wind of victory will tear them asunder!"

Pro Tips: When survival is not a concern, wait until Battle Will exceeds 3 stars to maximize DMG.

Converts Courage into a sustained wind field, dealing Attack Damage to nearby enemies until Courage runs out, using 16 Courage per second. The skill may be deactivated by clicking again.

Tips: Cast at full Courage and regain Courage during Valor Cyclone to extend duration.

Leaps into the air and crashes down, dealing massive Attack Damage to the target and surrounding enemies. For every 1 stack of Sharp consumed, this skill gains 5% charge.

Tips: Sharp Impact deals massive DMG. Aim to consume as much Sharp as possible within a fixed time window to maximize DMG.

Enhanced Falcon Toss, leap into the air and gather wind power, launching a fierce wind blade spear. Deals 750% ATK as Attack Damage to all enemies in the area and significantly reduces their tenacity, growing with the upgrade/advancement of the Falcon Toss skill.
Immediately gain 3 stacks of Sharp after Casting .

Enhanced <linktext=1523><style="ItemQuality_5">Spiral Thrust</style></linktext> that can unleash an ultimate strike, dealing continuous <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">1150%</style> of ATK to all enemies within range, which scales with the Level/Tier of <linktext=1523><style="ItemQuality_5">Spiral Thrust</style></linktext>.

Thrusts forward, then leaps back to unleash a powerful burst of wind pressure, delivering a finishing blow that deals Attack Damage equal to 345% ATK, which scales with the Level/Tier of Basic Attack.
Restores 20 Courage immediately upon use.

After dealing 6 instances of DMG, gains 1 stack of Battle Will.
Battle Will: A manifestation of fierce will. Grants a Shield upon gaining, with 20% base Defense.

Pro Tips: Keep up continuous DMG to maintain the shield effect and stack Battle Will.

Energy
A vital resource needed to perform Special Attacks and select Expertise. Regenerates 4 points per second, with a starting maximum of 100 points.

Basic Attack: Vine's Grip
Executes a sequence of up to four attacks, dealing Magic Damage.

Tips: Fill the gap with Basic Attacks when Energy is too low to for other offensive abilities.

Performs a gentle hop, summoning vines to glide and deal Verdant DMG.
Bloom
During the glide, casts Bloom instantly to launch 3 Dodder Seeds. Dance can be used twice in a row. Dance can be used twice in a row.

Pro Tips: This is a charge-based skill-watch charge cap to avoid waste. After casting, uses Basic Attack to trigger Bloom for extra hits and 3 more Dodder Seeds
Throws Dodder Seeds at the target, dealing <style="dendro">Verdant DMG</style>. Each round launches 3 seeds, for a total of 5 rounds.

Chants for 1.8s, then consumes 30 Energy to heal the caster and up to 10 nearby allies (Party Members Prioritized). Healing grows with MATK.

Tips: In emergencies, cast repeatedly for fast healing. Otherwise, use Basic Attacks to stack Regen Buds, boosting Bloom's healing.

Creates a barrier using the forest power. When the barrier forms, it continuously deals Magic Damage to nearby enemies. The caster and up to 10 nearby allies receive 25% Defense and HOT while inside the barrier.

Tips: Great for easing pressure on the party. Cast before incoming DMG. Requires solid timing awareness.

Harnesses forest power to summon a spirit deer that charges forward, dealing massive Verdant DMG to all enemies along its path. When it vanishes, it leaves behind a Fertile Domain that heals allies standing inside.
"Power of the earth, heart of the forest-may the source of life never run dry!"

Pro Tips: This Ultimate creates a wide rectangular area damage path and a healing zone. Pay attention to enemy placement before casting. While active, each attack skill that hits an enemy spawns a Dodder Seed-chain your skills to trigger more.

Consumes 20 Energy to summon a giant vine that strikes a target area, dealing Magic Damage and healing the caster and the nearby ally with the lowest HP (Party Members Prioritized). Healing grows with MATK.

Use on demand in emergencies. For better results, pair with offensive skills to trigger Symbiotic Marks and boost effectiveness.

Summons a seed to strike enemies, dealing Magic Damage and reducing their Move SPD by 30%. While dealing DMG, the seed restores a total of 30 Energy.
This skill holds 2 charges.

Tips: Casting is advised when Energy is low.

Consumes 30 Energy to channel a seed barrage for 5.9s, dealing Magic Damage to enemies. You can move while channeling.

Tips: Great for solo play or filling DMG gaps.

Consumes 40 Energy to channel forest power for 4s, healing the caster and up to 10 nearby allies over time. Healed targets also gain 15% All Elemental Damage Reduction for 10s.

Tips: A strong healing skill for high-pressure moments. Since it requires channeling, time your cast carefully.

Consumes 20 Energy to imbue the caster and up to 10 nearby allies with the forest power for 10s, healing them every second (Interval affected by Haste).

Tips: Cast after combat begins to provide steady team-wide healing over time.

Chants for 2.3s, then consumes 40 Energy to release a pulse from the caster. The pulse heals the caster and all affected allies, while also dispelling debuffs.

Tips: Optimal usage is in situations requiring dispels, with careful timing to avoid CD.

Applies an acceleration effect to the caster. Increases MATK and reduces CD while active.

Tips: Cast when other skills are on CD .

Deals <style="magic">Magic Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">200%</style> ATK to enemies in the path, and restores HP equal to <style="accent-gn">100%</style> ATK to allies in the path (which scales with the Level/Tier of <style="accent-gn">Special Attack</style>).

Healing
Heals the caster for a small amount of HP.

Channels for <style="accent-gn">6</style>s, summoning falling seeds every 0.5s to deal <style="magic">magic damage</style> to nearby enemies. At the same time, heals up to <style="accent-gn">10</style> nearby allies (prioritizing teammates) and grants them <style=“accent-gn”>25%</style> DMG Reduction.

Immediately resets the CD of Healing <style="accent-gn">Expertise Skill</style>s and grants <style="accent-gn">50</style> <style="accent-gn">Energy</style>. While active, surrounds you with verdant energy, increasing ATK, reducing skill <style="accent-gn">Energy</style> costs, and each <linktext=1527><style="ItemQuality_5">Life Bloom</style></linktext> cast shortens the remaining CD of Healing <style="accent-gn">Expertise Skill</style>s.

Unleashes vines, inflicting Stun on surrounding enemies while dealing Magic Damage, and restoring HP to friendly targets around you.

Tips: This is an instant cast skill. Paired with Lifebind Spec talents, it provides good damaging and healing capabilities in combats requiring continuous movement.

Grants a Nature Shield to the caster and up to 10 nearby allies.

Tips: Great for high-pressure moments, helping stabilize the party. Pairs well with Smite Spec Talents for healing allies.

Consumes 30 Energy to summon giant vines that strike a target area, dealing Magic Damage and healing the caster and the nearby ally with the lowest HP (Party Members Prioritized). Healing grows with MATK.

Tips: In emergencies, cast repeatedly for fast healing. Otherwise, use Basic Attacks to stack Regen Buds, which improves both healing and DMG.
Healing Pulse
Flourish Seed
Plant
Plant
Plant

Basic Attack: Crimson Blaze
Unleashes up to four consecutive strikes, dealing Fire DMG.
Plunge Attack: Flamefall Slash
Leaps and slams twin axes downward, striking enemies along the path and dealing Fire DMG upon impact.
Heavy Strike: Blazing Shockwave
Holds to charge, then swings forward with full force, dealing Fire DMG.

Pro Tips: Good filler when main skills are on CD .

Spins rapidly while advancing, unleashing flames that deal Fire DMG to enemies along the path.
Fire Demon - Crimson Lotus Frenzy
After using the Ultimate, enables faster follow-up attacks for Crimson Lotus.
Opener: Dashes forward with a slashing strike, dealing Fire DMG.
Frenzy: Rapidly swings twin axes in cycles, dealing multiple rounds of Fire DMG. Attack SPD increases attack rounds.
Finisher: Crosses arms for a cruciform slash, unleashing a massive Crimson Lotus orb in the area, dealing Fire DMG.
"Lead me to the realm of oni, ignite the undying flames of wrath!"

Pro Tips: Your core Attack during Ultimate. Rapid, sustained attacks deal massive DMG. Higher ATK SPD extends duration.

Leaps high and slams down at the target's location, dealing Fire DMG to enemies within range.
Fire Demon: Wildfire of the Arakawa
After casting the Ultimate, unleashes a powerful ground slam at the target location, dealing Fire DMG to enemies within range.

Pro Tips: Engage Skill. Covers a long distance, allowing you to quickly approach enemies.

Fire Demon:·Ember-End Slash
Enters the Scorching Flame state and unleashes a devastating slam to enemies along your path, dealingFire DMG.
While in Scorching Flame, Flame Energy drains over time and also decreases with every Secondary and Main skill used. Once the gauge is depleted, the state ends.
"Burn-let the embers consume everything."

Pro Tips: Main Attack skill. While in Ultimate, all other skills are enhanced. Faster ATK SPD means more hits and more consistent Ignite.

In normal state, regenerates Flame Energy over time. Once full, the Ultimate becomes available, entering Scorching Flame state upon use.
Scorching Flame
Basic Attack, secondary skill, and main skill with enhanced forms.
Phoenix's Vigor
The lower your HP, the faster your Attack SPD.
Ignition
This skill has a chance to Ignite enemies on hit, dealingFire DMG over time and restoring a small amount of Flame Energy.
"Let the flames cleanse the world-unleashing a torrential blaze that cannot be stopped."

Pro Tips: The passive skill works best with shield-based weapons or talents. Higher ATK SPD enhances shield effects.

Blade Intent
Stacks 2 Blade Intent per second. When fully charged, Special Attack is enhanced: Consumes 100 Blade Intent to greatly increase its casting speed.

Basic Attack: Swift Justice
Unleashes up to four sweeping strikes in scythe form, each dealing Attack Damage.

Tips: Time your Special Attack right after maxing out Blade Intent for maximum DMG.

Unleashes the power of Blade, ; each attack shifts its form into a scythe, dealing increased Attack Damage and granting 1 Thunder Sigil.
This skill holds 5 charges.

Tips: To avoid overflowing Thunder Sigils, always keep at least one charge regenerating whenever possible.

A supreme sword technique sharp enough to cut the air itself. Unleashes a flurry of slashes in front, dealing Attack Damage to all enemies in range. Grants max Thunder Sigil at the end of the strike.

"Heaven's weapon dims even the brightest stars."

Tips: Cast when Thunder Sigil is empty to quickly charge it. Also effective against multiple targets for massive area damage.

After charging, delivers a swift forward slash that consumes all Thunder Sigils to deal Attack Damage. Each Thunder Sigil consumed boosts DMG by 25%.

"Everything I see, hear, or sense-can be severed."

Tips: For maximum DMG, use when Thunder Sigil count reaches its limit.

Consumes 3 Thunder Sigils to dash forward with a spinning blade attack, dealing Attack Damage to nearby enemies. Moonstrike simultaneously performs a circular slashing attack, dealing Attack Damage to surrounding targets. This DMG grows stronger with Scythe Wheel skill upgrades and advancements.
"Under the moonlight, I move as one with the shadows."

Tips: For maximum effectiveness, use when multiple Moonstrikes exist to trigger additional whirling attacks.

Unleashes the energy of scythe, enhancing the next 3 Basic Attacks. Each enhanced attack deals higher Attack Damage and grants 1 Thunder Sigil.
This skill holds 3 charges.

Tips: Each use grants 3 Thunder Sigils. Ensure Thunder Sigil does not overflow, and keep at least one charge regenerating for consistent re-charge.

Consumes all Thunder Sigils, and charges forward after powering up to slash all enemies, dealing Attack Damage. Each Thunder Sigil increases DMG by 25%.

"Between lightning flashes, the blade leaves its sheath."

Tips: A cornerstone skill of Iaodo Slash Spec. Prioritize using it before Iaido Slash. For maximum DMG, use when your Thunder Sigils are at their maximum.

Consumes all Thunder Sigils to release slashes across a wide area, dealing Attack Damage. Each Thunder Sigil increases DMG by 25%. Grants immunity to all DMG while slashing.

Tips: Best paired with core skill of the Spec. For maximum DMG, use when facing 3 or more targets and your Thunder Sigils are at their maximum.

Changes weapon to a scythe, swinging it to perform multi-hit attacks against surrounding enemies, dealing Attack Damage and repel enemies. The final strike inflicts a 50% Wound on the target for 10s.
Summons Moonblade to aid in combat.

Moonblade: Spins for 35s, dealing Attack Damage on the target every 2s. Casting Moonstrike commands all active Moonblades to release a whirlwind attack, dealing Attack Damage to nearby enemies. When you die, Moonstrike ends immediately and the remaining CD of Scythe Wheel is refunded.

Tips: Core skill of the Spec, release just prior to each Moonstrike's expiration to maximize DMG.

Enters a defensive stance, gaining immunity to all DMG. If hit while in this stance, counterattacks with a slash and leaps backward. Recast to dash forward and slash, dealing Attack Damage. If the attack hits a target, gains max Thunder Sigils.

Tips: Release under intense battles or when confident in timing to gain Thunder Sigil more efficiently.

Phantom Scythe Wheel
Approach the target at lightning speed, then creates a Phantom Scythe Wheel, dealing Thunder Element damage for 3s, striking every 0.5s.

Tips: Reliable Attack skill when enemy movement is unpredictable. Great for dealing massive DMG.

Raijin Dash
Use the Thunder Power to vanish into the air, then unleash rapid slashes from air, dealing multiple hits of Thunder Element damage.

Tips: Grants extended Super Armor during the attack, making it an excellent option for sustained wide-area DMG.

Double lightning-fast Iai Slashes. Inflicts Attack Damage on enemies at the cost of 50 Blade Intent. Once Attack Speed reaches 25%|50%|80%, deals 1|2|3 additional attack(s). If Blade Intent remains after the strike, the skill can be recast.

Tips: Core skill of the Spec. Consumes Blade Intent to deal DMG. Release when Blade Intent is at its maximum.

Double lightning-fast Iai Slashes. Inflicts Attack Damage on enemies at the cost of 50 Blade Intent. Once Attack Speed reaches 25%|50%|80%, deals 1|2|3 additional attack(s). If Blade Intent remains after the strike, the skill can be recast.

Tips: Core skill of the Spec. Consumes Blade Intent to deal DMG. Release when Blade Intent is at its maximum.

Double lightning-fast Iai Slashes. Inflicts Attack Damage on enemies at the cost of 50 Blade Intent. Once Attack Speed reaches 25%|50%|80%, deals 1|2|3 additional attack(s). If Blade Intent remains after the strike, the skill can be recast.

Tips: Core skill of the Spec. Consumes Blade Intent to deal DMG. Release when Blade Intent is at its maximum.

A supreme sword technique sharp enough to cut the air itself. Unleashes a flurry of slashes in front, dealing Attack Damage to all enemies in range. Grants max Thunder Sigil at the end of the strike.
"Heaven's weapon dims even the brightest stars."

Tips: Cast when Thunder Sigil is empty to quickly charge it. Also effective against multiple targets for massive area damage.

Enchants the blade with thunderous power. While active, any action that would grant Thunder Sigils would instantly maxes them out. Also increases ATK and grants Super Armor for the duration.

Tips: Best paired with Overdrive and Talents to rapidly gain and spend Thunder Sigils, unleashing massive DMG within a short window.

Unleashes raging Thunder within, generating 20 Blade Intent every 1s. When in this state, using Expertise that consume Blade Intent triggers a Lightning Strike, dealing Attack Damage to the current target.

Tips: Pair with Thundercut to generate more Thunder strikes. Higher Mastery significantly increases Moonblade DMG for the Moonstrike Spec.

Basic Attack:·Thunderclap Arcane

Plunge Attack:·Thunderfall from the Heavens

Heavy Strike: Thunder Onslaught
Gathers energy to unleash a powerful cannon blast. During the charge, consumes heat gauge to continuously stack Thunder Onslaught, which increases DMG and range. Releasing the skill or completing the charge unleashes a wide fan-shaped Lightning area damage.
Thunderclap
Increases the next Thunder Onslaught's DMG and AoE range, stacking up to 3 times.

Pro Tips: When monsters are close, hold down Basic Attack to more efficiently knock them back.

Thunder Zone
launches into the air and fires a Thunder Bomb at the target. On hit, it deals Thunder DMG and creates a Thunderfield lasting 7s.
Thunderfield
deals AoE Thunder DMG every second to all enemies within the range, with a Slow debuff.

Pro Tips: This skill can be cast while airborne, granting enhanced mobility during execution.

Thunder Traverse
Unleashes a relentless stream of homing thunder orbs that track enemies and deal Thunder Element damage on impact. Hold the skill button to continue the barrage, consuming the heat gauge to extend its duration.

Pro Tips: Best used when fully charged-hold the skill to unleash an overwhelming barrage for dealing massive DMG.

Thunderburst Oblivion
Launches an Oblivion Bomb that detonates after a short flight or on impact, unleashing a destructive burst of Lightning area damage. Immediately maxes out the weapon's heat gauge upon cast.

Pro Tips: Cast from a safe distance to unlock a brief window of massive Attack.

When dealing DMG, there is a chance to trigger Sigil: Lightning Chain.
Sigil: Deals 1 instance of Thunder Element damage to nearby enemies, bouncing up to 4 times.

Pro Tips: Strike fast when monsters are clustered so that you can start the chain reactions.

Rage
An initial cap of 100 points is assigned to this resource, which serves as the essential component for the execution of Special Attacks and Expertise. Restores 2 Rage upon taking DMG, subject to a maximum 0.5s CD.

Basic Attack: Halberd's Edge
A heavy four-strike combo with a wide-blade Guardblade, each strike dealing Attack Damage and generating 5 Rage.

Tips: Rage should be accumulated through the use of Basic Attacks.

Leaps forward with a mighty swing, striking enemies along the path and dealing Earth DMG. Launches yourself into midair, allowing for a follow-up Plunge Attack

Pro Tips: Hit, jump, then drop the Hammer Blow.

Backsteps with a wide sweep, dealing Earth DMG and entering a charge stance. Tap again or wait to unleash two dashing strikes, dealing Earth DMG
In the charge stance, you can use [Dragon Slash]

Pro Tips: You can dodge to interrupt the backstep and avoid incoming DMG. precise hit after modification can instantly restore Energy.

Tectonic Ring
Unleashes the force of Earth, deals massive Attack Damage to a large area in front, inflicts stun on the targets for 3s, and taunts the enemies within range. Then gathers power to instantly obtain 5 Sand Crystals, and to enter Earth Guard mode.
Earh Guard
Lasts 8s and grants Super Armor, which increases your Armor by 100%, Max HP by 50%, and generates 40 Rage over time.

Tips: Casting is recommended during instances of significant incoming DMG.

Consumes 40 Rage to gather Strength and dash forward, knocking back all enemies in the way and dealing continuous Attack Damage. When the dash ends, unleashes a devastating slam that causes massive Attack Damage. The dash can be redirected. Targets with Resilience won't be knocked back but will have it reduced.

Tips: Cast against enemies without Super Armor or chip away at tough targets' resistance.

Consumes 40 Rage to unleash a powerful shockwave that deals Attack Damage to all nearby enemies. When sufficient Sand Crystal is available, it is consumed to generate a Shield that absorbs all incoming DMG, lasting for 12s. For each additional Sand Crystal consumed, additional shield value is added, with a maximum of 2 Sand Crystals consumed at a time. (Shields can stack, but cannot exceed 100% of Max HP.)

Tips: Casting is recommended when no shield is active to ensure continuous shield uptime.

Erects an immovable rock wall and enter a defensive stance, taunting nearby monsters and becoming invincible. Blocking a Lethal Skill causes the wall to shatter and counterattack the target, dealing Attack Damage to all the enemies in front.

Tips: Ultimate tank skill, perfect for absorbing extreme DMG.

Charges ahead with immense force. Upon hit, gains 25 Rage and 1 Sand Crystal, deals Attack Damage, and stuns the enemy. Becomes unstoppable during the execution of the charge.
This skill holds 2 charges.

Tips: This skill enhances mobility and accumulates Rage quickly.

Consumes 50 Rage and 5 Sand Crystals. Unleashes a mighty roar, dealing Attack Damage to nearby enemies, interrupting their actions, and granting an all-DMG-absorbing shield. (Shields may be stacked, with a maximum capacity equivalent to 100% of maximum HP) Reduces Attack Damage taken from the target by 10% for 12s.

Tips: Provides damaging capabilities when survival pressure is minimal and grants greater Armor in situations where enemies predominantly inflict Attack Damage.

Consumes 30 Rage to swing your weapon and create a vacuum, pulling nearby enemies toward you. Deals Attack Damage, interrupts their actions, and reduces their Move SPD by 70% for 8s.

Tips: Effectively pulls monsters into range for faster takedowns.

Gathers sand around yourself, dealing a burst of Attack Damage to surrounding enemies. The sand then solidifies, dealing Attack Damage to surrounding enemies for 6s. Throughout this effect, continuously regenerates Rage and Sand Crystal, providing 33 Rage and 6 Sand Crystals.

Tips: Keep it active as often as possible. The continuous AoE DMG poses a great threat to the enemies while generating Rage quickly.

Unyielding Defense
Grants Super Armor and Shield.

Consumes 40 points of Rage, violently slams down the weapon, dealing Attack Damage to surrounding enemies, and enters the Countercrush state. During this time, Block Chance +100%, Attack Damage taken from blocks -30%.

Tips: Very effective in environments with mostly Attack Damage. After casting, the block chance increases, reliably reducing Attack Damage taken.

Consumes 40 points of Rage, violently slams down the weapon, dealing Attack Damage to surrounding enemies, and enters the Countercrush state. During this time, Block Chance +100%, Attack Damage taken from blocks -30%.

Tips: Very effective in environments with mostly Attack Damage. After casting, the block chance increases, reliably reducing Attack Damage taken.

A heavy four-strike combo with a wide-blade weapon, each strike dealing Attack Damage and generating Rage

Raise your blade high and dive from the air, slashing through enemies along your descent. Upon impact with the ground, deals Attack Damage.

Channels Earth Strength to taunt nearby enemies while automatically counterattacking Lethal Skills for 10s. Also increases Armor and reduces DMG taken by 20%.

Tips: Cast promptly during high-pressure combat to enhance survivability.

Consumes 3 Sand Crystals, dealing Attack Damage to the target and reducing DMG taken by 10% for the next 10s (non-stackable).

Tips: When you have enough Sand Crystals, a good use of Granite Fury delivers high DMG and ensures high chances of survival.

Forms a rock barrier around yourself that automatically counterattacks Lethal Skills for a set duration. Taunts nearby enemies and increases Block DMG Reduction. For each Sand Crystal consumed, the duration is extended by 1 second, up to a maximum extension of 5s.

Tips: Time it well to significantly increase your Block DMG Reduction to mitigate incoming Attack Damage as much as possible.

Consumes <style="accent-gn">Sand Crystals</style> and <style="accent-gn">Rage</style>, dealing Attack Damage to the target and reducing DMG taken for the next <style="accent-gn">10s</style> (non-stackable).

Enhanced Star Shatter. Lunges at the enemy, dealing Attack Damage equal to 500% ATK, knocking them airborne. Scales with the Level/Tier of Star Shatter.
Gains double Rage and becomes Enraged.

Raises your weapon for a mighty blow, dealing Attack Damage equal to 300% ATK, and knocking the target airborne. Scales with the Leve/Tier of Basic Attack.
Gain 25Rage upon casting.

Enhanced <linktext=1539><style="ItemQuality_5">Granite Fury</style></linktext>, condenses the power of giant rocks, summoning a massive boulder to crash down from above the target, dealing <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">650%</style> ATK to the enemies within range, and is bound to deal Crit DMG. Scales with the Leve/Tier of <linktext=1539><style="ItemQuality_5">Granite Fury</style></linktext>.

Tips: Provides damage out when survival pressure is minimal and grants greater Armor in situations where enemy units predominantly inflict Attack Damage.

Gains Rage when DMG is dealt. Critgenerates additional Rage. When Rage is full, your next Plunge Attack and Heavy Strike are empowered, granting Super Armor during the cast and Rock Sand Entanglement afterward.
Rock Sand Entanglement: Grants a powerful Shield.

Pro Tips: With the correct CRIT chacnes, you can unleash a full combo of Basic Attacks followed by a secondary skill and finish with a perfectly timed Hammer Blow.
The Hero's Herb on the plains, the taste of lightness and freedom

Initial max Photon Energy
is 100. Once full, performing a Special Attack will activate Photon Reforge state, consuming 25 Photon Energy per second. The state ends when Photon Energy reaches 0. During this state, certain skills gain enhanced effects.

Basic Attack: Bullseye
Quickly draw the bow to fire up to four consecutive arrows, each dealing Attack Damage. When not in Photon Reforge state, the attack restores 2 Photon Energy.

Tips: Use Basic Attack to build up Photon Energy.

Concentrates Photon Energy and fires a massive arrow toward enemies.
Upon impact with an enemy or reaching maximum range, the arrow explodes, dealing continuous Attack Damage to all enemies in the blast area, creating a gravity effect, and inflicting Vulnerability and Rooted.

Tips: An excellent crowd-control skill that can be decisive in multi-target engagements.

Leaps upward swiftly and fires at enemies, dealing Attack Damage. Grants immunity to Attack Damage for you and up to 10 nearby Allies for 5s.

Summon Falcon: The summoned Falcon dives in a straight line, dealing Attack Damage to all enemies in its path before disappearing.

Each time when a Class Skill deals Crit DMG, Explosive Arrow gains 1 charge. At 5 charges or after 6s, the Explosive Arrow explodes, each charge increases the DMG of Explosive Arrow by 100%.

Tips: Better paired with Falconry Spec. Focus on Crit DMG to power up the explosion.

SkillTable_Clean.json.EnglishLong:
Peaceful Tune
A magical melody that, whenever DMG is dealt, restores HP equal to 20% of the DMG dealt, distributed evenly among up to 5 allies (Party Members Prioritized).
Allies at full HP will not be included in the healing targets. If all Allies are at full HP, the healing will be considered as excess healing.
Performance Energy: Energy required to play Melody skills (Heroic Melody and Healing Melody). 1 point is regenerated per second.
Performance Passion: Required to perform music. 1 point is regenerated every 5s.

Basic Attack: Resonant Strings
Strums the strings to emit a scorching soundwave, dealing long-range Magic Damage to the enemy.

Tips: Using Basic Attacks when Performance Passion and Performance Energy are not maxed out provides consistent healing. Pair with talents to store this healing for emergency use.

Instantly releases a powerful sonic wave, dealing Magic Damage to nearby enemies. Heals nearby allies and grants a Shield that decays over time. The Shield decays every 0.5s, lasting for 10s. Doubles the Performance Passion cap and fully restores Performance Passion.

Performance Passion: Required to perform music. Regenerates 1 stack every 5s.

Tips: A powerful emergency shield to ease team survival pressure. Time the cast to minimize shield decay. Once fully charged with Performance Passion, trigger burst.

Consumes 3 Performance Passion to play a healing tune, healing yourself and the nearby ally with the lowest HP. Healing scales with MATK.

Performance Passion: Required to perform music. Regenerates 1 stack every 5s.

Tips: High coverage healing skill. Use it before your Performance Passion overflows.

Leaps high and slams your guitar into the ground to burst sparks, dealing Magic Damage to the enemies within range.
Each instance of DMG dealt by Amplified Beat (only once per multi-target hit) increases the hit count of Harmonic Anthem by 1, up to 3.

Tips: Master the Amplified Beat's mechanic of increasing hit count to boost Harmonic Anthem's Attack.

My Passion Still Burns! Consumes 5 points of Performance Passion to summon a randomly shaped graffiti on the ground, healing 10 allies (Party Members Prioritized), dispelling debuffs on them, and dealing Magic Damage to enemies within range.
While standing within the graffiti, the summoner gains 10% Fire Bonus.

Performance Passion: Required to perform music. 1 point is regenerated every 5s.

Tips: This skill has the widest range for both healing and DMG. Cast it once the CD ends for max effectiveness.

A rousing melody. When Performance Energy exceeds 15 stacks, you can begin the performance, which cannot be stopped once started. CD: 5s.
While performing Heroic Melody, you consume 6 Performance Energy per second, and every 3s, 10 allies restore HP (Interval affected by Haste).
While you perform Heroic Melody, every 7s, your String Strike transforms into Fierce Strike.
While you perform Heroic Melody, the conversion rate of Peaceful Tune +50%.

Performance Energy: Required to play Melody skills (Heroic Melody and Healing Melody). 1 point of energy is regenerated per second.

Tips: The skill can't be stopped manually, so time its activation wisely to maximize synergy with Peaceful Tune and Fierce Strike.

A soothing melody. When Performance Energy exceeds 15, you can start the performance freely and stop at will. Each time you start, a speaker is deployed to perform a Concerto. (Speaker disappears when Healing Melody ends.) CD: 5s.
While performing Healing Melody, consumes 3 Performance Energy per second, and heals 10 allies every 1 second (Interval affected by Haste).
Speaker: When you cast Healing Beat, Fivefold Crescendo, Rock the Stage, Concert Circuit, the speaker will simultaneously cast the same skill.

Performance Energy: Required to play Melody skills (Heroic Melody, Healing Melody). Regenerates 1 point per second.

Tips: Mastering where and when to place the speaker is essential.

Let the Passion Flow Again! Consumes 3 Performance Passion, reigniting the spirits of the weary. Performs a sequence of notes that heals 10 allies.

Performance Passion: Required to perform music. Regenerates 1 stack every 5s.

Tips: Highest healing potential. Monitor your team's health to maximize efficiency and prevent overhealing.

Strums the strings and releases searing flames forward, dealing Magic Damage to the enemies within range and dispelling debuffs for up to 10 allies (Party Members Prioritized).
Charging changes the skill's range and DMG.
Tier 1: Chants for 0.7s, affects a fan-shaped area with an 8-meter radius in front.
Tier 2: Chants for 1.4s, affects a fan-shaped area with an 8-meter radius in front, increases the DMG dealt by 50%.
Tier 3: Chants for 2.1s, affects a fan-shaped area with an 8-meter radius in front, increases the DMG dealt by 100%.

Tips: Delivers massive DMG. When paired with Speaker and talents, it offers potent DMG and Healing. Be mindful of your surroundings during casting.

Let the Passion Flow Again! Consumes 5 Performance Passion, reigniting the spirits of the weary. Performs a sequence of notes that heals 10 allies.

Performance Passion: Required to perform music. Regenerates 1 stack every 5s.

Tips: Highest healing potential. Monitor your team's health to maximize efficiency and prevent overhealing.

The perfect piece for fan interaction. Grants Encore effect to 10 allies for 10s.
Encore: Grants Super Armor. Each time an offensive or healing Expertise Skill is cast, there is a 50% fixed chance to trigger Encore Strings once, dealing DMG to the current target or healing the lowest-HP ally.

Tips: Cast during your team's burst window for optimal DMG and healing of Encore.

Increases your MATK for a period of time and amplifies the next skill you cast.

Special Attack: Your next 2 Special Attacks do not consume Performance Passion.
Fivefold Crescendo: Doubles the healing instances.
Heroic Melody: Halves the time needed to trigger Fierce Strike.
Harmonic Anthem: Doubles the DMG dealt.
Passion Burst: Allows for direct cast in its strongest form, no chanting required.

Tips: Evaluate the battle environment and your combat style, then apply the appropriate enhancement at the optimal moment.

Swings your guitar with force, dealing Magic Damage equal to 300% ATK to nearby enemies. Harmonic Anthem instantly gains 1 charge. Scales with the Level/Tier of Basic Attack.

Tips: Cast this skill when Harmonic Anthem is on CD.

Peaceful Tune
A magical melody that, whenever DMG is dealt, restores HP equal to 20% of the DMG dealt, distributed evenly among up to 5 allies (Party Members Prioritized).
Allies at full HP will not be included in the healing targets. If all Allies are at full HP, the healing will be considered as excess healing.
Performance Energy: Energy required to play Melody skills (Heroic Melody and Healing Melody). 1 point is regenerated per second.
Performance Passion: Required to perform music. 1 point is regenerated every 5s.

Basic Attack: String Strike
Strikes the guitar's sideboard to produce a frenzied wave, dealing Magic Damage to nearby enemies.

Tips: Using Basic Attacks when Performance Passion and Performance Energy are not maxed out provides consistent healing. Pair with talents to store this healing for emergency use.

SkillTable_Clean.json.EnglishLong:
Channels for 6s and continuously spews searing flames forward, dealing Magic Damage equal to 1000% ATK in total to the enemies within range.

Tips: Move continuously and try to maximize DMG dealt while staying safe.

Instantly releases a powerful sonic wave, dealing Magic Damage to nearby enemies. Heals nearby allies and grants a Shield that decays over time. The Shield decays every 0.5s, lasting for 10s. Doubles the Performance Passion cap and fully restores Performance Passion.

Performance Passion: Required to perform music. Regenerates 1 stack every 5s.

Tips: A powerful emergency shield to ease team survival pressure. Time the cast to minimize shield decay. Once fully charged with Performance Passion, trigger burst.

A mobile performance melody. While performing, continuously heals allies. Deals Magic Damage to nearby enemies. Each healed ally increases healing by 6%, up to 30%. Each enemy hit increases DMG by 6%, up to 30%.

Tips: Sustained healing and DMG. Adjust your position based on the number and location of targets to maximize efficiency.

Holy Sigil
Resource required to cast Special Attacks and some Expertise. There are 5 initial Holy Sigils. Each Holy Sigil enters a 10s CD after being consumed, and generates 10 Photon Energy.

Photon Energy
Resource required to cast some Expertise, starting at a max of 100.

Basic Attack: Blade of Justice
Unleashes a 3-hit sword combo followed by a Swing, each hit dealing Attack Damage.

Consumes 1 Holy Sigil to deliver a powerful shield bash to enemies in front, dealing Attack Damage and increasing your Armor, stacking up to 3 times.

Tips: Monitor the Armor buff from Valor Bash and try to keep it active at all times.

Consumes 1 Holy Sigil. After a brief charge, performs a fierce sweep forward, dealingAttack Damage and gaining 2 stacks of Lightforged Barrier.

Lightforged Barrier: Each stack increases max HP by 2%, up to 10 stacks. Taking any DMG consumes 1 stack. The Barrier lasts 25s or until all stacks are consumed. Gaining a new stack refreshes the duration.

Tips: Maintain high stacks of Lightforged Barrier while weaving in attacks. Pay attention to the use of Vanguard Hunt to trigger bonus effects.

Unleashes holy energy to strike nearby enemies, dealing Attack Damage and inflicting Dazzle for 5s. Grants a Radiant Shield equal to 300% ATK. For the next 10s, instantly refreshes 1 Holy Seal for every 2s (prioritizing the Holy Seal with the longest remaining CD), and generates 10 Photon Energy each time.

Radiant Shield: Infuses the Shield with light, absorbing 50% of incoming DMG. The effect can stack absorption and reset duration when the Skill is reused. Max absorption cannot exceed 100% of Max HP.

Tips: Instantly boosts survivability and generates Holy Sigil and Photon Energy. Time the casts wisely.

Tosses the spinning shield, taunting nearby enemies, dealing Attack Damage, interrupting their actions, and reducing their DMG dealt by 10% for 10s.

Tips: Boosts survivability while unleashing wide-range DMG, ideal for handling multiple targets with strategic timing based on defense and battlefield needs.

Creates a holy zone beneath your feet, healing yourself every second and healing allies in the area slightly, dealing Attack Damage to enemies.

Tips: Great for sustained DMG and healing. Try to cover as much area as possible.

Consumes 45 Photon Energy to call down a blast of holy light on the target area, dealing Attack Damage and healing yourself based on HP lost (minimum heal: 5% of Max HP).

Tips: Cast when your HP is low-but not critically low-to maximize healing while staying safe.

Consumes 2 Holy Sigils. Performs a fiery blade strike at all nearby enemies, dealing Attack Damage.

Tips: Powerful offensive skill. Use when survivability is not an issue.

Enhanced <linktext=1563><style="ItemQuality_5">Reckoning</style></linktext>, whose DMG is equal to <style="accent-gn">2</style> times that of <linktext=1563><style="ItemQuality_5">Reckoning</style></linktext>, and does not consume <style="accent-gn">Holy Sigil</style>but can still generate Holy <style="accent-gn">Energy</style>.

Holy Barrier
Consumes Holy Energy to raise your shield and emit the energy. Protects you and allies in a half-circle behind you, absorbing all incoming DMG within the area. The shield vanishes upon reaching its max absorb limit.

Summons Aegis Ward to shield yourself, automatically countering Lethal Skills while increasing Armor and DMG Reduction. If you takes fatal amount of DMG while this effect is active, the effect is consumed to prevent death and immediately restore 25% HP.

Tips: Powerful DMG Reduction effect combined with death prevention, extremely valuable when facing extreme survival threats.
Deals <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">200%</style> ATK to the enemy (which scales with the Level/Tier of <style="accent-gn">Basic Attack</style>).

Enhanced <linktext=1563><style="ItemQuality_5">Condemn</style></linktext>, whose DMG is equal to <style="accent-gn">2</style>times that of <linktext=1563><style="ItemQuality_5">Conviction</style></linktext>.

Consumes up to 8 stacks of Lightforged Barrier, summoning continuous radiant energy to spiral rapidly around you. Each second, it deals Attack Damage to nearby enemies (interval affected by Attack Speed) and grants 1 stack of Lightforged Barrier.
Each time it deals DMG to 1 target, restores 1% max HP (up to 5%). When activated, each stack of Lightforged Barrier adds 2s to the duration, up to a maximum of 16s.

Lightforged Barrier: Max HP +2% with each stack. Lightforged Barrier stacks up to 10 times. Any incoming DMG consumes 1 stack. The effect lasts 25s or until all stacks are consumed. Duration resets each time a new stack is gained.

Tips: Cast Lightforged Barrier to deal DMG and heal. Cast the skill when Lightforged Barrier is fully stacked to achieve excellent defense and burst potential.

Gains Unwavering resolve, hurling 5 shields toward the nearest enemy targets within a 10-meter radius, prioritizing the closest. Each hit deals Attack Damage, interrupts, and taunts the targets. Afterwards, throws 1 shield every 2s, each granting 10 Photon Energy. For the next 10s, damage taken per hit is reduced by a percentage of your Max HP, and any Lethal Skills are automatically countered during this period.

Tips: This skill does not consume Photon Energy or Holy Sigil to cast, and it provides strong survivability, making it ideal as an opening move.

Consumes 3 Holy Sigils, summoning a sword from beneath the target's feet to deal Attack Damage to the target, while gaining 5 stacks of Lightforged Barrier.

Lightforged Barrier: Each stack increases the final Max HP by 2%. You can have up to 10 stacks of Lightforged Barrier, and any damage taken will consume 1 stack. It lasts for 25s or until all stacks are consumed, and the duration resets each time a stack is gained.

Tips: While having considerable damage capability, it can efficiently replenish Lightforged Barrier.

Weaves Energy into a <linktext=1035><style="ItemQuality_5">Shield</style></linktext>. While active, if under a <linktext=1083><style="ItemQuality_5">Wounded</style></linktext> state, gain bonus <style="accent-gn">Shield Defense</style>.
